name: Kotohina
description:
What would you do when you meet your perfect boyfriend? One lonely night when she stepped out to see her boyfriend, Kotohina has found her answer. Will death do them apart? She'll stay with him for the rest of her life. 

Help her see through this short love story. 

(Kinetic novel, 976 words)

-----

Quick entry for the O2A2 Jam
